unnormalised: Boro, tor tumkam potachea tras zata, kiteak? Xrestt lokankui zatat. Ek gastroenterologist mhonnun, hanv Dilli-chea Apollo Hospitals lagim aslolea mhojea clinic, ‘Dr. Kumar's Gastro Care’ hankam anek torechea pachanachea problemam-xim borech lokank polletam. Hanvem kaim utar divchem mhunn tharailam, ek ixttagaticho margodorsak bhaxen.
normalised: Borem, tumkam pottache tras zata, mhunn dista? Soglleank zata tem. Ek gastroentrologist mhunn hanv Delhi hangache Apollo Hospitalasoortiche ‘Doctor Kumar’s Gastro Care’ mhojea clinicant veg-vegllea toreche pachonache prosn aslolea zaitea lokank mevta. Mhaka dislem hanv thoddi mahiti hanga vanttun gheum, ek ixtachi margdorxon kiteak noka korun?

unnormalised: Poileach pavttek, "sadharan" mhunn kiteak mantat? Satyan, tem bodolta! Punn tumkam nirantor jevnnachi jalan, dor jevnna uprant fugarponn (fakt ek roti-ntui!), vo sanchea ritin bodlop (sadharan-than don satolleank bond zatat bhaxen), tor dekh diunk layakachem asa. Digenek topunk ani borem zatolem mhunn axek ghevnk zaina.
normalised: Poilem, “sadharan” mhunn kitem manterat? Khorench sangta zalear, tem bodlot rauta! Punn tumkam nirantor jiv jeltta, dor eka jevnna uprant pott fugta (fokot ek roti khaun legit!), vo nityakromant bodol zata (sadharon thaun don satolleam poros chodd kobst zata), zalear teacher lokx divpak zai. Dor vellar fokot ek Digene gheun borem zatolem mhunn upeog na.

unnormalised: Sadharan gunhegar konn? Tanav, khorak (Hello, tikhat biryani!), ani kednam-kednam, tem tumcheo jinsok asat. Punn hanv asho rogi polletam je Dr. Google-chea adharacher atm-nidan kortat. Thoddi zannvai khatrechi asta. Udharonnak, borech lok IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome) kednacho tras zata mhunn mantat.
normalised: Samanya apradhi konn? Tan, aahar (namaste, tikhat biryani!), ani kednaim, tumchi genes. Punn hanv chodd korun Doctor Googleacher dharun apleach apnnak rogachi vollokh ditleaank polleta. Thoddi mahiti opaykari asta. Udharonnak, zaite pavtti tras zata mhunn I-B-S (Irritable Bowel Syndrome) mhunn somoztaat.

unnormalised: Sadharan sthitincher uloium-ia. Acid reflux ek vhoddlem asa. Ratiche jevonn soddun diunk ani chai (Maf kor!) unno korunk adhar kortolem. Uprant: gallstones. Lakxonnant fattiche khoxenche dukh aspavta, jerbailea khorak jevnna uprant tumchea voirchea uzvea potan. Zaituch vaitt asa tor sarkek goroz poddtta. Laparoscopic cholecystectomy-chi sadharan kimot ek private hospital-an Rs. 60000 aspas asta.
normalised: Ami samanya sthiticher uloya. Acid reflux ek vhodd problem. Der ratri jevop tallop ani chai komi korop (maf korat!) upiogak poddta. Uprant: gallstones. Lakxonant tupaacho aahar khele uprant tumchea ujeveuttchea pottant ekdom bhikar dukhop aspavta. Taka khorech vaitt dista zalear surgery korchi poddta. Laparoscopic cholecystectomy che sadharan kharche ek private hospitalant sumar rupiya saaatth hozar asta.

unnormalised: Uprant H. pylori asa, ek bacteria-chem infection jem ulcers korunk xakta. Antibiotics-xim sarkhem korunk sopem, punn lakx diunk naslem tor, tem vhoddle problem korunk xakta. SRL Diagnostics-an ek urea breath test-achi kimot lagbhag Rs. 1500 asta. Zori mellop ek chavi-rup asa.
normalised: Uprant H. pylori asa, ek bacterial infection zo ulcer utponn korunk xakta. Antibiotics ghevn sahajik porin upchar korunk zata, punn polle naslo zalear, ti vhodd problem utponn korunk xakta. S-R-L Diagnostics hanga urea breath test korunk lagbhag rupiya ek hozar panchxem kharche yeta. Xigr vollokh muhim asa.

unnormalised: Atam, nidanchea vixim ek utor. Ek endoscopy bhayanok aikunk xakta (tumchea kantthantlean ek tube sokoil voita!), punn tem ek xoktivant instrument asa. Tumcho esophagus, pot ani duodenum dekhunk mellta. Colonoscopies te bhaxen asat, punn vhoddle anntyakhatir. Borech Gastroenterologists dor panch vorshamni ek 50 vorsam uprant recommend kortat.
normalised: Aata, diagnostics vixim thodde utor. Endoscopy bhayanok dista (ek tube tumchea golleantlean sarko sarko voita!), punn tem ek xoktivant sadhan. Tumchi annnali, pott ani duodenum dekhunk mellta. Colonoscopies tachi pori asta, punn vhodd anthddeak. Choddxe Gastroenterologist panch vorsanim ek pavtt ponchavonthrea vorsanchea umra uprant korunk sangtaat.

unnormalised: Tumi tumchea sancheant rogot, nirarthak vazon unnem (>6 mhoineank 5 kgs) vo nirantor ultio vochun dhi'aan diunk soddum naka. Hem colorectal cancer sarkhe anink kaim vaittacher lakxonnank zatat. Him lakxonnam somyank bori zatat, dekhun borech pavtti dekhunk lagtat, punn tem adim sarkhem korunk borem.
normalised: Rogonachea lakxonacher lokx divnakat je tumchea sanddant rogot dixtti poddta, bodnaxtt vazon unnem zata (sa vorsanim panch kilogram poros chodd), vo nirantor ulti yeta. Him kitleak tori bhikarachim lakxonam zaunk xakta, colorectalal cancerachem zaunk xakta. Him lakxonam kallant vaitt zaunk xaktat, mhunn te polleunk gheop ut'tom.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tumchea kuxik aikunk zait mhotvachem asa. Kaim vaitt dista tor, ek gastroenterologist-achi salas ghevnk khont korunk naka. Ami pachanachea arogyachea sonvsarantlean vatt dakhoinchek asa, sopinchea aharachea bodlanchean zaituch gunthogunnachea upacharank. Yaad dovortat, tumchea potachi bori tumchea ak'khea bori-xim zoddlea. Dekhun, dekh di, ani tem tumchi dekh ditolet! Atam appointment book kor! Kall kor +919876543210 an immediate adharakhatir.
normalised: Nimannem, tumchea xorirak aikop mhuntvachem asa. Kitem tori venkem dista zalear, ek gastroentrologistchea sangatak vochpak tras divnakat. Ami tumchea pachonachea arogachem margdorxon korunk hanga asam, sadea aaharachea bodlantlean komi tratment. Yaad dovrat, tumchea pottak tumchea sogllea borenchea sangatak lagta. Mhunn tache xit divat, ani tem tumchem xit divtolem! Azo appointment book korat! Madot melloupak plus ninety one nine eight seven six five four three two one zeroacher phone korat.
